thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-‍J Murphy & Sons Says Acquired Carillion's Uk Power Framework Business

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-‍J Murphy & Sons Says Acquired Carillion's Uk Power Framework Business
text:
Feb 7 (Reuters) - ‍J MURPHY & SONS:
* ANNOUNCED HAS ACQUIRED CARILLION‘S UK POWER FRAMEWORK BUSINESS FOR AN UNDISCLOSED SUM​
* ‍MURPHY ALSO BECOMES NEW JOINT VENTURE PARTNER OF ELTEL FORMING MEJV ON OVERHEAD LINE AND T PYLON FRAMEWORK​
* ‍AGREEMENT MEANS CO TAKES OVER CARILLION‘S POSITION ON NATIONAL GRID‘S ELECTRICITY OVERHEAD LINES, SUBSTATION AND UNDERGROUND CABLE FRAMEWORK CONTRACTS​
* ‍CARILLION EMPLOYEES WILL JOIN MURPHY, BROADENING ENERGY INFRASTRUCTURE SERVICES OFFERED TO THEIR POWER CUSTOMERS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
